pages.text: The $(item)Sigil of Eternal Imprisonment$() is an upgraded form of the Sigil of the Captured Soul.$(br2)Rather than storing creature souls within the sigil itself, the $(item)Sigil of Eternal Imprisonment$() imprisons entities within $(item)Soul Vessels$().$(br2)A $(item)Soul Vessel$() is a fragile container capable of holding

the soul of a single entity. Once a creature has been captured within a $(item)Soul Vessel$(), the vessel becomes bound, imprisoning the soul within.$(br2)The captured entity can be released by throwing the vessel at the ground, shattering the $(item)Soul Vessel$().$(br2)$(bold)Cost:$() $(blood)500 LP$()/use
